name: Rune Deer
description:
The ancient and powerful RUNE DEER appears. 

Beware its MAGICAL ENERGIES.

You must capture 5 PHOTOS with your camera.

WASD or arrow keys to move. SPACE to jump. LEFT MOUSE CLICK to take a photo. ENTER when you have taken 5 photos. 

Screenshots are saved to the Screenshots folder within the game folder. 

Made for bubblegum jam!
